Mei surrounds her opponent with her [[Boil Release: Skilled Mist Technique|acid mist]], immobilising them, and then blows a kiss at the opponent, sending out a large lava sphere which creates a powerful explosion on contact.

== Trivia ==
* The word {{translation|"dissolving"|溶解|yōkai}} is a pun on the Japanese words {{translation|"apparition/demon"|妖怪|[[Wikipedia:Yōkai|yōkai]]}} and {{translation|"melting apparition"|溶怪|yōkai}}.

[[es:Elemento Lava: Disolución de Ácido Explosivo]]
